the message content cannot be empty.

your account is currently inactive. This allows you to log in but disables certain features such as the ability to order or manage your newletter subscriptions.

to activate your account, you must confirm your email address by clicking on the confirmation link that was sent to you. If you do not receive this email, you can have it sent again via the link below.
to activate your account, you must fill in and confirm your information via the link below.
to activate your account, contact us through the contact form.
your email address has been confirmed.
there are no customer accounts matching your request.
your customer account is not awaiting an email address confirmation.
the email address in your account is not the one which you are trying to confirm.
a new email has been sent to confirm your email address. Click on the link in this email in order to confirm your address.
an error occurred while sending the confirmation email.
to use this feature, you must have a customer account.

this page allows you to manage a list of addresses which you can then use as a billing or shipping address. To add a new address, click on "Add new address". To edit an existing address, click on "Edit".
Your customer account was successfully created. You will receive a confirmation email.
Creating your account allows you to monitor your different orders and to, of course, receive all of our promotional offers.
